mapper.insert: insert into t_transfor_effect (bid, did, incoming_page, incoming_entrance, is_new, incoming_position, behavior, is_success, first_amount, total_amount, t_is_success, t_first_amount, t_total_amount) values (#{bid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{did,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomingPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomingEntrance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isNew,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incomingPosition,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{behavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSuccess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{firstAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tIsSuccess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tFirstAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tTotalAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_transfor_effect (bid, did, incoming_page, incoming_entrance, is_new, incoming_position, behavior, is_success, first_amount, total_amount, t_is_success, t_first_amount, t_total_amount) values
(#{item.bid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.did,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.incomingPage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.incomingEntrance,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isNew,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.incomingPosition,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{item.behavior,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isSuccess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.firstAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.totalAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.tIsSuccess,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tFirstAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.tTotalAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE did=values(did)
